title: Best of The Herd: 11/14/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 11/14/2019
description:
Colin explains the differences between the Steelers and the Browns cultures in a very interesting way that you have to hear to understand. He says Tom Brady might be the toughest QB he's ever seen mentally. Greg Cosell of NFL Films tells Colin that he doesn't understand how the Cowboys are 5-4 considering how good their offense looks on tape. Plus, former NFL DB Will Blackmon talks about the Raiders culture being so good under Jon Gruden and why he still believes in Baker Mayfield.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
